<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Awakened Tree](/Monsters.aspx?ID=28)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Arboreal regents and other wielders of powerful primal magic grant temporary sentience to trees in order to protect the forest. Invested with a workable set of instincts and the ability to mobilize and attack, these awakened trees follow the commands of their master and fight to protect their home. The statistics below work just as well for foliage that has become animate via other methods, such as a mystical influence from another dimension, a capricious fey spirit, or the like.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Plant](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 22

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 20

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 17
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<trait label="Plant" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=125" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 25</row>

**Perception** +13; low-light vision

**Languages**
[Arboreal](/Languages.aspx?ID=26); (can’t speak any language)

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +14, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +9

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +6

**Dex** -1

**Con** +6

**Int** -5

**Wis** +3

**Cha** +0
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 22 

**Fort** +16 

**Ref** +9 

**Will** +13 

</row>

**HP** 100

**Resistances**
bludgeoning 5, piercing 5

**Weaknesses**
axe vulnerability, fire 10

**Axe Vulnerability** An awakened tree takes 5 additional damage from axes.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 20 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
branch +16 ([reach 15 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 2d8+6 bludgeoning

**Melee**

root +16 ([Trip](/Traits.aspx?ID=196)),
**Damage** 2d6+6 bludgeoning

</column>
